summary: Pinocchio is a famous fictional character from the Italian book *The Adventures of Pinocchio*. He is a wooden puppet brought to life by a woodcarver named Geppetto. Pinocchio's biggest wish is to become a real boy. His nose grows longer whenever he tells a lie. The story is well-known worldwide and has been made into a popular Disney movie. The name Pinocchio might come from the Italian word for 'pine nut'.
title: Pinocchio
